results.title: Sweet long ride
results.creator_credit: Linda Ellen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Laurie and Linda Ellen have taken holidays four times a year for the past thirty-four years. She reflects on the changes in their holidaying as well as some of the more enduring memories of their time away from home.

results.title: My life with my family
results.creator_credit: Negabanchi Tebeje, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Life, so far, has been quite a struggle for Negabanchi Tebeje and her family. With her dad fighting for democracy, the Tebeje family have moved from Ethiopia to Sudan and, finally, Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Negabanchi Tebeje, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Building
results.creator_credit: Dale Smith, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Dale Smith dedicates her story to her dad, a man of infinite creativity and resourcefulness. His inventiveness extended to building houses, caravans, mobile homes, trailers and, above all, a family who adore him.

results.title: Anything can happen in life
results.creator_credit: Zenebech Tebeje, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Zenebech Tebeje reflects on growing up in her large family and how quickly life can change. But if you can adapt and embrace your new life, you can do anything.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Zenebech Tebeje, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Zenebech Tebeje reflects on growing up in her large family and how quickly life can change. But if you can adapt and embrace your new life, you can do anything.

results.title: Train the trainer : Digital Storytelling project
results.brief_description: These seven stories are a culmination of a Digital Storytelling ‘Train the trainer’ workshop, held at ACMI in April 2008. The stories are of a personal nature and are centred around an important part of the participant’s lives.
